root.name: Dark Rift
root.description: OVERVIEW Dark Rift (Space Dynamites in Japan) is a 3D fighting game released, Jul 10 1997 N64, Oct 22 1997 PC and Mar 27 1998 in Japan on the N64 and Windows PC. Best known for being the first game to use 60fps on the N64. Developed by Kronos Digital Entertainment and published by Vic Tokai, as well as distributed. GAMEPLAY Dark Rift controls similar to any other fighting game, game modes include arcade tower plus multiplayer gaming in the one system. The game covers three dimensions in which you fight, Neutral Dimension (where Earth is located), the Dark Dimension (home to demons), and the Light Dimension (home to energy beings). CHARACTER · Aaron · Demonica · Eve · Gore · Morphix · Niiki · Scarlet · Zenmuron · Sonork · Demitron
